refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The ltsinfo tool prints information about the labelled transition system (LTS) in &infile;. If &infile; is not supplied, &stdin; is used.
The format of &infile; is determined by its contents. The option &opt_in; can be used to force the format for &infile;. A list of supported formats can be requested by using the option &opt_formats;.
